title: Bertie Plays the Blues
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: Yes, what about fish and chips? There's that place down in Henderson Row – L'Alba D'Oro. They get awards for their fish and chips.

title: Friends, Lovers, Chocolate
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: On Henderson Row, groups of boys were coming out of the Edinburgh Academy, clad in their grey tweed blazers, engaged in the earnest conversation which boys seem to have in groups. In the distance, somewhere within the school buildings, the Academy Pipe Band was practising and she stopped for a moment to listen to the drifting sound of the  bagpipes.
